sections.heading: Library; librarian.The Clerk of the Supreme Court shall have the charge of the State Library, of which he shall be librarian
sections.text: SourceLaws 1871, § 2, p. 52;R.S.1913, § 3778;C.S.1922, § 3171;C.S.1929, § 51-102;R.S.1943, § 51-102.Cross ReferencesFor provisions of bond of State Librarian, see section 11-2
